text: Helen Slayton-Hughes (October 30, 1930; December, 7 2022) is an American actress. She played Ethel Beavers in Parks and Recreation. She was born in Glen Ridge, New Jersey. Her career began in 1980. Slayton-Hughes died in her sleep on Wednesday, December 7, 2022 at age 92. Her death was publicly announced by her family on Thursday, December 8, 2022, via Facebook. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:People from Glen Ridge, New Jersey Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Helen Slayton-Hughes
